title: Unlocking water potential in drylands: Quicklime and fly ash enhance soil microbiome structure, ecological networks and function in acid mine drainage water-irrigated agriculture

Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Rabelani Munyai, Henry Joseph Oduor Ogola, Virginia Wambui Kimani, David Mxolisi Modise
